description: bulbous footed jug with spout; on side in blue "S. Pector" in a cartouche; two putti with fan shape between on top of cartouche; face below with wings on either side; flowers and vines
dimension: 7 3/8 x 6 3/8 x 5 1/2 in. (18.73 x 16.19 x 13.97 cm) (including spout)
inscription:
Inscription and Label

title: Syrup jug
